Html:
Hi,

Does NAudio work under Mono/*nix?
Any plans to support said platforms?
Is it tried to any unmanaged code?

By the way, you seriously need to write some documentation... Maybe, just some examples... WITHOUT gui, simple stuff in terminal/console please...
API documentation would also be great, as far as I can see you have doc-comments to generate it...

Regards Jonas Finnemann Jensen.

Hi Jonas,
I'm afraid NAudio won't work under Mono as it relies on a very large amount of unmanaged code (although maybe if you combined it with something like WINE it might work).

As for documentation, yes I know that NAudio is severely lacking in this regard. I have been writing a few articles on my blog which may be of some help to you: http://mark-dot-net.blogspot.com/search/label/NAudio

Mark
